doc.summary: Gets whether an object should be registered into the LibX registration system.
doc.text: Gets whether an object should be registered into the LibX registration system. All  conditions must return true for an object to be registered.

doc.summary: A registry condition is used by the LibX registration system to prevent things  passed to <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/ModXRegistration" method="register" type="(java.lang.String,java.lang.Object)void">ModXRegistration#register(String, Object)</ref> from being registered.
doc.text: A registry condition is used by the LibX registration system to prevent things  passed to <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/ModXRegistration" method="register" type="(java.lang.String,java.lang.Object)void">ModXRegistration#register(String, Object)</ref> from being registered.  For more information see <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/ModXRegistration" method="initRegistration" type="(io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration.RegistrationBuilder)void">ModXRegistration#initRegistration(RegistrationBuilder)</ref>
